title: EXTRA: Republican Senator Tim Scott
itunes:title: EXTRA: Republican Senator Tim Scott
description:
In this Sound On EXTRA podcast, Kevin talks to South Carolina Republican Senator Tim Scott about bipartisan opportunity zone legislation and what he's watching on Netflix and what advice he would give to his 19 year old self.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
